title: Update hero heading text, circular logo framing, and modern welding hero background

requirements.text: Update the Hero section main heading text to remove the word "Complete" so the headline reads exactly: "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions".

quotes: from main heading "complte welding & solutions" remove 'Complete'

acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection no longer displays the word "Complete" in the main headline.
The main hero headline text renders exactly as: "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions".

requirements.text: Change the logo presentation to use a circular frame (not square) anywhere the logo is shown in the header/navigation and the hero branding area.

quotes: and logo frame should be circle type instead of square

acceptanceCriteria: The logo in the top navigation renders as a circle (e.g., with a circular mask/frame) on desktop and mobile.
The logo in the hero section renders as a circle (e.g., with a circular mask/frame).
No other layout regressions occur in the top navigation or hero section after the logo shape change.

requirements.text: Update the Home/Hero background to use a modern welding-themed background image/visual while keeping text readable (ensure adequate contrast for the hero heading, subheading, and buttons). Add the background image as a local static asset and reference it from the hero section (no remote image hotlinking).

quotes: background of home looking modern welding

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero/Home section background includes a modern welding-themed image/visual.
Hero text and CTAs remain clearly readable over the background across common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop).
The background image is served from local static assets (not a remote URL).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change the contact form flow or inquiry submission behavior.
Do not change business contact configuration values (phone/WhatsApp/email/address) as part of this edit.

required: Modern welding workshop background with sparks and equipment, dark industrial tone (hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
